member.summary: Represents a scheduled function that can be executed based on a condition.

member.summary: Gets or sets the schedule for the cron function.

member.name: P:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Jobs.Cron.CronFunction`1.CronExpression
member.summary: Gets or sets the cron expression for the function. For guidance visit: https://crontab.guru/

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the function should execute on startup.

member.summary: Gets or sets the cron job state provider.

member.name: M:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Jobs.Cron.CronFunction`1.RunAsync
member.summary: Framework function to control CRON job execution. WARNING: ** It's not recommended that you override this function. **
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains a boolean value indicating whether the function executed successfully.

member.name: M:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Jobs.Cron.CronFunction`1.ExecuteAsync
member.summary: Executes the function logic asynchronously.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains a boolean value indicating whether the function executed successfully.

member.name: T:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Jobs.Cron.CronJobState
member.summary: Represents the state of a CronJob, including its last run time, success status, and next run time.

member.name: P:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Jobs.Cron.CronJobState.LastRunDateTimeUtc
member.summary: Gets or sets the last run date and time of the CronJob in UTC.

member.name: P:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Jobs.Cron.CronJobState.NextRunDateTimeUtc
member.summary: Gets or sets the next run date and time of the CronJob in UTC.

member.name: T:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Jobs.Cron.FileCronJobStateProvider

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The directory where cron job state files are stored.
The time provider to use for getting the current time.

member.summary: Gets or sets the directory where cron job state files are stored.

member.name: P:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Jobs.Cron.FileCronJobStateProvider.TimeProvider
member.summary: Gets or sets the time provider to use for getting the current UTC time.

member.summary: Gets the state of the specified cron job.
member.typeparam: The type of the cron function.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains the state of the cron job.

member.summary: Updates the state of the specified cron job.
member.typeparam: The type of the cron function.
member.param: The next execution date and time in UTC.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains the updated state of the cron job.

member.summary: Gets the file path for the state of the specified cron job.

member.summary: Common interface to get and update the state of a cron job.

member.summary: Gets the state of the specified cron job.

member.name: M:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Jobs.Cron.ICronJobStateProvider.UpdateCronJobStateAsync``1(System.DateTimeOffset)
member.summary: Updates the state of the cron job with the next execution date and time.
